project.elearnt

Class ProjectExists

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • project.elearnt.ProjectExists

  • public class ProjectExists
extends Activity
    This class responsible for correct the before projects creates between the options figures create again, modify (name and graphic mode), delete and send
    Version:
    1.0 November 27, 2014
    Author:
    Jose Ignacio Madan Frias

      List the projects names
      void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Create the basic configuration on the screen, with one button for continue, spinner and edit text to get the principal properties of the project, and of course spinner for select what do you want do with the project (create again, modify, delete or send)

      Put graphic mode used in first position to show
      void setVisibility()
